title: Migrating U.S. Sweepstakes Users to Cardano Skill Gaming
summary: U.S. sweepstakes gaming platforms are being shut down, leaving millions of players and major affiliate networks without a legal, scalable destination for real-money online gaming.
solution: BananaClip offers a legal skill-gaming alternative with Cardano payouts. Through a Tier-1 affiliate integration, displaced sweepstakes users migrate to a transparent and scalable on-chain platform.
proposer_relevant_experience: The BananaClip team will lead all development, integration, testing, and coordination for this project.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe your established collaborations.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your established collaborations.
sub_fields.answer:
BananaClip has formed a strategic collaboration with Growth Leads, one of the largest affiliate operators in the U.S. online gaming and sweepstakes industry. Growth Leads manages high-value acquisition funnels for millions of players across casino, sweepstakes, and skill-gaming verticals, and is directly impacted by the nationwide regulatory shutdown of sweepstakes platforms.



Our partnership focuses on creating a compliant, scalable replacement destination for users currently funneled to sweepstakes operators that will no longer be legal in major states such as California (starting January 2026). Growth Leads has agreed to collaborate on:



- Technical integration of their attribution and tracking systems with BananaClip
- Traffic allocation from existing sweepstakes funnels into BananaClip during the pilot
- Joint performance analysis to validate conversion, compliance, and user behavior
- Co-marketing and promotional alignment for launch and ongoing campaigns



This collaboration provides BananaClip with immediate national distribution and access to a proven Tier-1 user acquisition engine. Growth Leads gains a compliant skill-gaming alternative capable of absorbing displaced sweepstakes traffic, while Cardano becomes the default settlement layer for deposits, contest entries, and payouts tied to this migration.

sub_fields.title: Describe funding commitments.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your funding commitments.
sub_fields.answer:
BananaClip and Growth Leads are jointly committing resources to ensure the success of this enterprise demonstrator pilot.



Growth Leads is contributing significant in-kind value through:



- Traffic allocation from their existing high-value sweepstakes funnels, representing millions of dollars in annual acquisition value.
- Integration engineering support, including implementation of tracking, reporting, and attribution systems required for large-scale user migration.
- Marketing exposure across Growth Leads’ owned properties, placements, and promotional channels at no additional cost to the project.
- Compliance consultation to align the pilot with emerging state regulations and ensure a fully legal alternative to sweepstakes gaming.



These contributions represent substantial commercial value and confirm Growth Leads' long-term commitment to transitioning users away from sweepstakes platforms and into BananaClip’s Cardano-backed skill gaming environment.



BananaClip is committing:



- Internal engineering resources covering infrastructure, Cardano integration, wallet settlement, and gameplay system enhancements.
- Product, compliance, and operational oversight throughout all phases of the pilot.
- A matching investment of ongoing development hours beyond what Catalyst funds cover, ensuring delivery of all integration milestones.
- Co-marketing and reporting efforts, including analytics, dashboards, publishing the enterprise case study, and on-chain transaction transparency.



Catalyst funding will be used exclusively for future development, technical integration, scaling, Cardano settlement infrastructure, and co-marketing execution. All parties are committed to delivering a compliant, operational, and measurable pilot that drives sustained on-chain transaction volume for Cardano.

sub_fields.title: Describe your key performance metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your key performance metrics.
sub_fields.answer:
The pilot will be evaluated on two primary KPI groups:



1. User Migration



- Number of users referred by Growth Leads
- Conversion rate to registered BananaClip accounts
- Percentage of users who enter at least one contest



2. On-Chain Activity (Core Catalyst Metric)



- Total Cardano transactions from deposits, entries, payouts, and withdrawals
- Stablecoin volume processed on Cardano
- Average on-chain transactions per active user



These metrics directly measure adoption, usage, and Cardano transaction impact — the core outcomes this pilot aims to validate.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
We will integrate BananaClip, a legal skill-based gaming platform, with Growth Leads, one of the largest affiliate networks serving U.S. sweepstakes players. As state regulations shut down online sweepstakes operators, Growth Leads needs a compliant destination for the significant user traffic they can no longer send to sweepstakes platforms.



This pilot creates that pathway by redirecting a portion of Growth Leads’ traffic to BananaClip, where users can participate in skill-based contests instead of chance-based sweepstakes. BananaClip enables real-money contest entries and payouts using Cardano stablecoins, providing transparent on-chain settlement, low-cost microtransactions, and a verifiable audit trail that aligns with emerging state compliance requirements.



The pilot will test the full user migration funnel end-to-end: referral, onboarding, contest participation, and Cardano-settled payouts. Success will demonstrate that Cardano can support a large-scale, consumer-facing gaming vertical and provide a viable, compliant alternative for millions of users displaced by the decline of sweepstakes platforms.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
This pilot brings large-scale, mainstream users onto Cardano through a real consumer application. As sweepstakes platforms shut down, millions of players must transition to legal alternatives. By integrating BananaClip with Growth Leads’ national user acquisition channels, Cardano becomes the settlement layer for deposits, entries, and payouts for a high-volume skill gaming vertical.



This creates immediate, measurable benefits for the Cardano community:



- Significant on-chain activity from real users making real transactions
- Stablecoin transaction volume tied to a major consumer use case
- Increased awareness of Cardano as a practical settlement solution in the U.S. gaming market
- A proven enterprise integration, demonstrating Cardano’s value to a Tier-1 partner
- A compliant model that other gaming and entertainment platforms can adopt
- A public case study showing Cardano’s scalability, cost efficiency, and regulatory alignment



The result is a visible, high-impact demonstration of Cardano’s utility that strengthens the ecosystem, drives adoption, and positions Cardano as a leading chain for consumer applications.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Our team has a proven track record of delivering what we commit to. BananaClip is already live today with a full gaming platform, real users, and functioning crypto payouts. We were also the first project on Cardano to complete a native integration with Fireblocks, demonstrating our ability to execute secure, production-grade infrastructure.



We work closely with Growth Leads, who are directly involved in shaping the pilot and confirming the traffic and integration requirements. Feasibility will be validated through controlled traffic tests, on-chain transaction monitoring, and ongoing data reviews with our partner as we scale.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Integration Architecture & Project Setup

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: This milestone delivers the complete technical integration plan covering how BananaClip, Cardano settlement, and Growth Leads will connect across tracking, attribution, and payout systems. It also includes internal documentation for compliance, state-level regulatory considerations, and a fully set-up project management workspace used to track progress across all teams.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: Acceptance requires that the architecture plan is finalized, internally reviewed, and shared with Catalyst. The compliance outline must be completed and approved by our internal team, and the project workspace must be created with all tasks loaded. A kickoff meeting must occur with notes recorded, demonstrating all teams understand scope and responsibilities.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: Evidence will consist of a PDF export of the architecture plan, a PDF outline describing compliance considerations, screenshots showing the project workspace setup, and documented notes from the kickoff meeting confirming alignment between BananaClip, Growth Leads, and project leadership.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Cardano Settlement Implementation

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: This milestone completes the development of the Cardano settlement layer, including stablecoin-based deposits, withdrawals, and payouts implemented in a staging environment. A full connection to Fireblocks will be established to ensure secure settlement flows. Internal test transactions will be executed to validate reliability and readiness for further testing.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: Acceptance requires the settlement code to be deployed in a working staging environment, with at least several test transactions executed and logged. The internal test checklist must be completed and reviewed, confirming that all core functions—deposit, contest entry flow, and payout logic—are behaving as intended within controlled test conditions.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: Evidence will include screenshots of the staging environment showing the settlement UI and workflow, logs of completed Cardano test transactions with transaction hashes, and a short technical summary document describing what was implemented and how the tests were performed. This documentation will demonstrate the system is operational at the integration level.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
The budget is allocated to cover the engineering, integration, compliance, testing, and reporting work required to execute a nine-month enterprise demonstrator pilot with Growth Leads. Most costs are concentrated in the early phases where the bulk of development and infrastructure setup occurs. Funds will support senior engineers, full-stack developers, blockchain specialists, infrastructure and DevOps resources, compliance review, analytics preparation, QA, and coordinated pilot operations.



1. Cardano Settlement Engineering – 240,000 ADA



This covers the design and development of the Cardano settlement layer, including stablecoin deposit and payout logic, Fireblocks wallet integration, transaction execution, state handling, and internal testing. It also includes infrastructure setup and DevOps work required to maintain a secure, stable staging environment.



2. Growth Leads Integration & Tracking Systems – 155,000 ADA



Allocated to implementing referral tracking, attribution endpoints, conversion data pipelines, analytics dashboard creation, and cross-team integration work. This includes engineering hours for working with Growth Leads’ technical staff, schema mapping, and validation of referral and tracking accuracy.



3. Internal Pilot Simulation & Load Testing – 80,000 ADA



This includes engineering time for traffic simulation, QA validation, on-chain settlement testing under controlled load, monitoring setup, bug fixes, optimization passes, and preparation for external traffic. It also includes infrastructure costs related to testing environments.



4. External Pilot Execution & Monitoring – 65,000 ADA



Covers engineering oversight during the limited external pilot with Growth Leads, ongoing monitoring, data capture, refinement of settlement flows, reliability improvements, and internal reporting on system behavior throughout the live test period.



5. Compliance, Documentation, and Reporting – 95,000 ADA



Allocated to preparing regulatory alignment documentation, internal compliance outlines, required architectural documentation, system performance reports, and final closeout package materials. Also includes the creation of the case study and walkthrough video required by Catalyst.



6. Project Management, Coordination & Contingency – 115,000 ADA



Supports project coordination across BananaClip and Growth Leads, milestone verification, reporting, communication, and general management of the pilot timeline. This also includes a necessary contingency buffer for unexpected engineering adjustments, infrastructure needs, or additional testing.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
This project delivers strong value for the Cardano ecosystem because it directs an existing, proven, large-scale user acquisition engine into a real on-chain use case. The cost of the project is primarily allocated to engineering, integration, and the technical work required to bring Cardano settlement into a high-volume consumer product that already exists. Rather than funding concept development or speculative experiments, Catalyst is supporting the integration of Cardano into a live platform with an established partner and a clear path to measurable transaction volume.



The budget creates direct on-chain usage by enabling deposits, contest entries, and payouts to settle through Cardano stablecoins. This positions Cardano as the default settlement layer for a major U.S. gaming vertical at the exact moment sweepstakes platforms are being shut down. The project also produces a full enterprise case study and a validated integration that other gaming platforms can adopt, multiplying the long-term value to the ecosystem.



In short, the cost represents strong value because it funds concrete development, delivers a Tier-1 integration, produces real on-chain activity, and demonstrates Cardano’s readiness to support large consumer markets.
